name: Are you ready for Valve Index?
detailed_description:
Test your PC to determine whether you're ready for Valve Index VR.

Download this app to your Steam Library, where you'll discover it in the Tools section.

Check your computer's OS, RAM, CPU, GPU, USB, and other specs against our System Requirements to play VR titles using the Valve Index Headset.

Note that while Valve Index supports Linux and SteamOS, this application currently does not.

The Are You Ready for Valve Index? app does not guarantee compatibility with all-in-one PCs or laptops.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual Core with Hyper-Threading
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 970, AMD RX480
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Additional Notes: Available DisplayPort (Version 1.2) and USB (2.0+) Port Required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Quad Core +
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 1070 or better
  • Additional Notes: Available USB (3.0+) Port Required for Headset Pass-Through Camera & USB Port Support
